comments:
Using either the c:userRegion or the java:merge tag on an existing file that is under a linked folder results an error in the enclosing ws:file or java:class tag:

templates/main.jet(19,4):  <java:class name="Foo" template="templates/my.java.jet">
    Error: C:/temp/src-linked/a/b/c/Foo.java

The error log contains a stack trace, like the following:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: C:/temp/src-linked/a/b/c/Foo.java
at org.eclipse.jet.taglib.TagUtil.getContents(TagUtil.java:69)
at org.eclipse.jet.taglib.UserRegionHelper.finalizeContent(UserRegionHelper.java:85)
...

Created an attachment (id=65839)
Proposed Patch

This patch works both on 0.7.x and 0.8.0.
